title: Android 13 Developer Preview 2 brings the app drawer to the taskbar
content:
Android 13 Developer Preview 2 was just released on Thursday, with another round of new features and changes leading up to the final release of Android 13 later this year. Google highlighted some of the changes in the new build when it arrived, but it seems there’s another helpful improvement: an app drawer in the

The post Android 13 Developer Preview 2 brings the app drawer to the taskbar appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Android 13 updates the taskbar on large-screen devices with a new button to open the app drawer without going to the home screen.
